ESG Governance Chart  
ArcBest’s ESG governance starts at the top 
with oversight from our Board, the Nominating/
Corporate Governance Committee of the Board, 
the ESG Executive Sponsors and the ESG 
Committee. From there, ESG extends throughout 
the organization, where this important work 
is embedded in our day-to-day operations. 
The governance chart briefly summarizes each 
group's responsibilities.
